overview:
Rudy has been a leading entrepreneur in software, telecom and Internet services for more than 20 years. As founder/CEO of eFax.com, he led the Company’s IPO in 1997 which helped to drive one of the most successful freemium models for telecom services at the time - landing more than two million free fax-to-email subscribers in its first year from launch. Since eFax, Rudy served as CEO of RidgeRun, a Linux mobile phone software company tied closely to Texas Instruments in addition to two startups in mobile shopping systems and wireless networking. Prior to eFax, Rudy served in sales and marketing roles at Entropic Speech and IBM.

Rudy holds a BSME with Highest Honors from the University of Texas at Austin.
